Text:
Great torrent !!! -- No problems with the version I/you download.. There is no virus or anything else - very pleased with the download !!

Only issue is, if you update Coda 2 from 2.0.8 (which you download) to 2.0.9 then I need a serial key / crack -- it turns the App into a trial !! SADLY !! :'(
Hope this issue will be solved and/or, the crack will be handed out :)
